leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-晶体/结构生成与逆向设计生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 生成→筛选→验证→多目标优化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 生成模型 + 筛选器 + 工作流

tools.name: mof_screen
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput DFT screening workflow for MOFs using ASE and VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow tool designed for high-throughput density functional theory (DFT) screening of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs). It leverages the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) and VASP to automate structure relaxation and property calculation.

tools.name: aiida-gromacs
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with GROMACS, enabling automated, reproducible, and provenance-tracked molecular dynamics simulations. Developed by CCPBioSim.

tools.name: LLMatDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous materials discovery framework using Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to autonomously design and discover new materials. It integrates LLM reasoning with domain-specific tools for inverse design and property prediction.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen extension for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO files
tools.detailed_description: An add-on for the pymatgen library specifically designed to handle input and output files for Quantum ESPRESSO, facilitating data parsing and structure setup in DFT workflows.

tools.name: kimmdy
tools.one_line_profile: Reactive MD pipeline combining Kinetic Monte Carlo and GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A Python pipeline that couples Kinetic Monte Carlo (KMC) with Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulations using GROMACS. It enables the simulation of reactive systems and rare events by bridging time scales.

tools.name: strucscan
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight framework for high-throughput material simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework developed by ICAMS for managing high-throughput material simulations. It provides tools for structure generation, job submission, and data collection in computational materials science.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the FLEUR code (an all-electron DFT code). It supports high-throughput electronic structure calculations and workflow management.

tools.name: aiida-jutools
tools.one_line_profile: Utility tools for AiiDA workflows in materials science
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper tools and utilities for simplifying the creation and management of AiiDA workflows, specifically tailored for the JuDFT ecosystem (FLEUR, KKR).

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR KKR-GF DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the JuKKR code (Korringa-Kohn-Rostoker Green Function method). It enables high-throughput DFT calculations for impurities and disordered systems.

tools.name: libensemble
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for coordinating dynamic ensembles of scientific calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to coordinate the concurrent evaluation of dynamic ensembles of calculations. It is widely used in scientific computing for optimization, sensitivity analysis, and uncertainty quantification workflows.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS workflow add-on for the atomate2 workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for atomate2 that implements workflows for the LAMMPS molecular dynamics code, enabling automated high-throughput MD simulations.

tools.name: Express.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible workflow framework for ab initio calculations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A high-level, extensible workflow framework designed to accelerate ab initio calculations for the materials science community, written in Julia.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for deep learning with molecular and crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: Provides Keras layers for end-to-end learning on molecules and crystals, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen for input processing.

tools.name: ScalableWorkflow_VASP_Calculations
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable workflow for generating VASP input cases for alloys
tools.detailed_description: A scalable workflow designed to generate VASP input cases with randomized atomic structures for solid solution binary and ternary alloys across the compositional range.

tools.name: Parsl
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel scripting library for scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python parallel scripting library that enables the execution of parallel and distributed workflows, widely used in scientific computing for high-throughput simulations.

tools.name: DFTTK
tools.one_line_profile: Automation package for VASP workflows and thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for automating VASP workflows and storing results in MongoDB, specifically focused on finite temperature thermodynamics based on atomate workflows.

tools.name: FireCore
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated simulation environment for on-surface chemistry and SPM
tools.detailed_description: An integrated simulation environment dedicated to on-surface chemistry and scanning-probe microscopy (SPM), integrating GPU-accelerated classical mechanics and DFT.

tools.name: quacc
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible platform for computational materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A flexible platform for computational materials science and quantum chemistry built for the big data era, leveraging ASE for calculator abstraction.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching with chemically-guided bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for defect structure-searching employing chemically-guided bond distortions to identify ground-state defect configurations.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for defect supercell generation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: Software for the generation, pre-/post-processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations, implementing a reproducible defect simulation workflow.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Slab generation and analysis for surface calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for dealing with slabs for first principles calculations of surfaces, facilitating surface science workflows.

tools.name: VASP-DOS_extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Script to extract DOS data from VASP outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based python script to extract density of states (DOS) and projected DOS from vasprun.xml files for analysis.

tools.name: VASP-Structural_Descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: Script to collect structural descriptors from atomic structures
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based script to collect structural descriptors from many atomic structures, useful for machine learning or structural analysis.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CHAMP QMC code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to handle the workflow of the CHAMP Quantum Monte Carlo code using the AiiDA workflow engine.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0, enabling automated workflows for quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: CAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Autonomy for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: Agent-based sequential learning software for materials discovery, facilitating closed-loop autonomous experimentation and simulation.

tools.name: protosearch
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning for materials from DFT and prototypes
tools.detailed_description: Software for active learning of new materials using DFT calculations and crystal structure prototypes.

tools.name: ASEr
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for Allele-Specific Expression counts from BAM/fastq
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool to extract Allele-Specific Expression (ASE) counts from BAM files or raw fastq data. (Note: Domain is Bioinformatics, distinct from Atomic Simulation Environment).

tools.name: ALLM
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning for Accelerated Design of Layered Materials
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing active learning strategies for the accelerated design and discovery of layered materials.

tools.name: camd-eia-crosswalk
tools.one_line_profile: Data crosswalk for EPA and EIA power sector data
tools.detailed_description: A data integration tool/crosswalk to link U.S. power sector emission data (EPA CAMD) with operation data (EIA), facilitating environmental and energy research.

tools.name: mcp-atomictoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for atomistic simulations via LLMs
tools.detailed_description: An MCP (Model Context Protocol) compatible server that provides atomistic simulation capabilities through ASE and pymatgen, enabling LLMs to perform scientific simulation tasks.

tools.name: CPTI
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for constant potential thermodynamic integration in VASP
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool to perform constant potential thermodynamic integration calculations using VASP.

tools.name: AbiPy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analyzing the results produced by ABINIT (DFT code)
tools.detailed_description: Open-source library for analyzing the results produced by ABINIT, facilitating the post-processing of first-principles calculations.

tools.name: NepTrain
tools.one_line_profile: Automated toolkit for training neuroevolution potential (NEP)
tools.detailed_description: An automated toolkit for training neuroevolution potential (NEP), integrating tools like GPUMD, VASP, and NEP for streamlined workflows including perturbation, active learning, and potential training.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian based VASP Plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A VASP plugin for AiiDA that leverages Custodian for error correction and robust job execution.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface Phonopy with AiiDA, enabling automated phonon calculations and analysis.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: Automated active learning workflow for training neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA workflow that implements a fully automated active learning scheme to train a neural network interatomic potential.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for VASP
tools.detailed_description: The official AiiDA plugin for running simulations with the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP).

tools.name: AiiDAlab
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for computational science workflows
tools.detailed_description: Implements core functions for AiiDAlab, a web-based platform for managing and executing AiiDA workflows.

tools.name: aiidalab-qe
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab App for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: A graphical application within AiiDAlab for running and analyzing Quantum ESPRESSO calculations.

tools.name: aiidalab-widgets-base
tools.one_line_profile: Reusable widgets for AiiDAlab applications
tools.detailed_description: A library of reusable Jupyter widgets for building scientific applications in AiiDAlab, including structure viewers and plotters.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for ASE
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) with AiiDA.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface the LAMMPS molecular dynamics code with AiiDA.

tools.name: acwf-verification-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for AiiDA common workflows verification
tools.detailed_description: Scripts to run and perform data analysis for the verification of AiiDA common workflows across different materials science codes.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Common workflow interfaces for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing common workflow interfaces across various materials science codes and plugins to ensure interoperability.

tools.name: AiiDA Core
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science
tools.detailed_description: The core engine of AiiDA, a workflow manager for computational science that tracks provenance and manages calculations.

tools.name: aiida-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CP2K
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface the CP2K quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package with AiiDA.

tools.name: aiida-hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for Hubbard parameters
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA workflows for calculating self-consistent onsite and intersite Hubbard parameters from first-principles.

tools.name: aiida-project
tools.one_line_profile: Project manager for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A CLI utility to manage AiiDA projects and profiles, facilitating the organization of scientific workflows.

tools.name: aiida-quantumespresso
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: The official AiiDA plugin for running simulations with the Quantum ESPRESSO suite.

tools.name: aiida-shell
tools.one_line_profile: Run shell commands in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that allows running arbitrary shell commands within the AiiDA provenance tracking system, enabling flexible workflows.

tools.name: aiida-submission-controller
tools.one_line_profile: Submission controller for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: Utilities to manage large numbers of submissions in AiiDA, controlling the maximum number of concurrent runs for high-throughput tasks.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Wannier90
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface the Wannier90 code with AiiDA for computing maximally localized Wannier functions.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflows for Wannier90
tools.detailed_description: A collection of advanced automated workflows to compute Wannier functions using AiiDA and the Wannier90 code.

tools.name: aiida-workgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive workflow designer for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A tool to efficiently design and manage flexible workflows with AiiDA, featuring an interactive GUI and provenance tracking.

tools.name: active-learning-md
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for ML potentials
tools.detailed_description: Active learning workflow for generating machine learning inter-atomic potentials, specifically designed for amorphous and liquid systems.

tools.name: twod_materials
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput workflow tools for 2D materials characterization in VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools designed to facilitate high-throughput density functional theory (DFT) calculations for two-dimensional materials using VASP. It includes functionality for structure generation, defect analysis, and property extraction.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive python library for atomistic materials design, providing tools for high-throughput calculations, machine learning, and database management, associated with the NIST-JARVIS infrastructure.

tools.name: aiida-vibroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automated infrared, Raman spectra, and phonon calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that automates the calculation of vibrational properties, including infrared and Raman spectra, as well as phonon dispersions, using various DFT codes.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for high-quality rendering of atoms and molecules in Blender
tools.detailed_description: A tool that bridges Python and Blender to create publication-quality 3D visualizations of atomic structures and molecules, supporting various file formats and rendering styles.

tools.name: parsl-dag-vis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Parsl workflow dependency graphs
tools.detailed_description: A utility to visualize the Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs) of data flow dependencies in Parsl workflows, aiding in the debugging and monitoring of parallel scientific workflows within Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: crawfish
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen-compatible rewrite of ultrasoftcrawfish for materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: A utility library designed to work with pymatgen for analyzing and plotting electronic structure data (likely related to pseudopotentials or band structures), serving as a modernized version of legacy tools.

tools.name: parsli
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for celeri and skies geophysical modeling results
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for visualizing the outputs of 'celeri' and 'skies', which are codes used for modeling interseismic deformation and earthquake cycle dynamics in geophysics.

tools.name: gest-api
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization API for generators in scientific optimization workflows
tools.detailed_description: Defines a standard interface for generator algorithms used in scientific optimization frameworks like libEnsemble, Xopt, and optimas, facilitating interoperability in HPC workflows.

tools.name: parsley-scanner
tools.one_line_profile: Software for low-cost 3D scanning using laser triangulation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for controlling and processing data from a low-cost 3D scanning setup based on laser triangulation, generating 3D point clouds or meshes for engineering and analysis.

tools.name: ai2-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit integrating AI and ab initio methods for computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to facilitate computational chemistry research by combining artificial intelligence with ab initio (DFT) calculations, supporting workflow automation and potential generation.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D/3D visualizations for ASE/Pymatgen in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A library providing highly configurable SVG and Three.js visualizations for atomic structures handled by ASE or Pymatgen, specifically designed for integration within Jupyter Notebook environments.

tools.name: molpal
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning tool for accelerated high-throughput virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A software package that employs active learning strategies to accelerate the discovery of molecules with desired properties from large virtual libraries, optimizing the virtual screening process.

tools.name: deepmd-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy and molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package that generates accurate many-body potential energy surfaces and force fields for molecular dynamics simulations, bridging the gap between ab initio accuracy and classical MD efficiency.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction for DFT
tools.detailed_description: A software implementation of the D4 London dispersion correction model, which improves the accuracy of Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations by accounting for non-covalent interactions.

tools.name: PybridASE
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for studying allele-specific expression in hybrids
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline designed to analyze RNA-seq data for allele-specific expression (ASE) in hybrid organisms, facilitating the study of gene regulation and inheritance patterns.

tools.name: Auto-QChem
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for DFT calculations of organic molecules
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool for the generation, execution, and storage of Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations specifically tailored for organic molecules, streamlining computational chemistry tasks.

tools.name: parsleyapp
tools.one_line_profile: Data parsing and tidying tool for plate reader export files
tools.detailed_description: An R-based tool for extracting, tidying, and joining metadata with data exported from laboratory plate readers, facilitating downstream analysis of experimental data.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automated point defect calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA platform that provides automated workflows for setting up, running, and analyzing point defect calculations in crystalline materials.

tools.name: aiida-orca
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the ORCA quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface the ORCA quantum chemistry package with the AiiDA workflow engine, enabling automated and reproducible electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: ASE_VASP_automation
tools.one_line_profile: Automation scripts for VASP DFT workflows using ASE
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to automate VASP Density Functional Theory calculations using the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), facilitating high-throughput workflow management.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced band structure plotting tool using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating electronic band structure plots with RGB scales to visualize atomic or orbital contributions, built upon pymatgen.

tools.name: PhononFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tools for phonon calculations with VASP and phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to streamline the workflow for performing phonon calculations using VASP and phonopy.

tools.name: vaspMD
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tools for ab initio and MLFF Molecular Dynamics with VASP
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit to assist with setting up and post-processing ab initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD) and Machine Learning Force Field MD (MLFF-MD) calculations in VASP.

tools.name: ASE (Allele-Specific Expression)
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detection of differential allelic imbalance from RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect differential allelic imbalance using RNA-seq data. (Note: Distinct from the Atomic Simulation Environment).

tools.name: kimmdy
tools.one_line_profile: Reactive MD pipeline coupling Kinetic Monte Carlo and Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python pipeline that couples Kinetic Monte Carlo (KMC) with Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulations using GROMACS, enabling reactive MD simulations.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library of pre-built, production-ready workflows for computational materials science, designed to run on the FireWorks workflow software. It supports VASP, FEFF, and other codes.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing toolkit based on Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program for processing materials simulation data, providing utilities built upon the Pymatgen code for structure analysis and manipulation.

tools.name: pyemto
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for EMTO-DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to run and manage Exact Muffin-Tin Orbital (EMTO) Density Functional Theory calculations.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ASE interface for ANI-1 neural network potential
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface connecting the ANI-1 neural network potential with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) for molecular dynamics and optimization.

tools.name: aiidalab-ispg
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA Lab application for ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA Lab application (ATMOSPEC) designed to make ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy calculations accessible and automated.

tools.name: jkitchin/vasp
tools.one_line_profile: ASE-compliant Python interface for VASP DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an ASE (Atomic Simulation Environment) interface to the VASP density functional theory code, facilitating the setup, execution, and analysis of VASP calculations within Python scripts.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments for computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool for creating quantum mechanical environments, including conformer generation (RDKit/CREST), QM input creation, and post-processing of outputs for xTB and DFT calculations.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for manipulating pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility functions to assist in the generation and manipulation of structure graphs representing atomic systems, built on top of pymatgen.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for hybrid organic-inorganic perovskite structures
tools.detailed_description: A set of functions to manipulate and analyze the structural distortions in hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites, aiding in the study of their crystallographic properties.

tools.name: construction_zone
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for nanoscale atomic scenes for microscopy simulation
tools.detailed_description: Modules for generating nanoscale atomic scenes and structures, primarily designed to create inputs for S/TEM image simulations using pymatgen.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for LSMO laboratory research
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows and calculation plugins developed for the LSMO laboratory at EPFL, facilitating specific materials science simulations.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for RASPA molecular simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with RASPA, a software package for simulating adsorption and diffusion of molecules in flexible nanoporous materials.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Zeo++ porous materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA to interface with Zeo++, a software for performing geometry-based analysis of porous materials and their voids.

tools.name: aiida-graph-render
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for AiiDA provenance graphs
tools.detailed_description: Utilities to render complex AiiDA provenance graphs using GePhi, aiding in the visualization and debugging of scientific workflows.

tools.name: aiida-explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive provenance browser for AiiDA databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool to explore AiiDA databases, allowing users to visualize and navigate the provenance graph of materials science calculations.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow manager for the Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: The codebase merging pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks into custom workflows specifically for the Materials Project's high-throughput infrastructure.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation library of materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A library of computational materials science workflows built on top of Jobflow, Pymatgen, and Custodian, designed to run complex simulations (DFT, etc.) efficiently.

tools.name: FireWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for high-throughput computing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow software for defining, managing, and executing complex workflows, widely used in materials science for high-throughput calculations.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations using VASP, leveraging the Materials Project stack (pymatgen, custodian, fireworks).

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis and structure generation library
tools.detailed_description: Python Materials Genomics (pymatgen) is a core library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and supporting input/output for many electronic structure codes.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing classes and functions specifically for describing and analyzing alloy systems.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis module for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized module for pymatgen to analyze point defects in materials, including formation energies and thermodynamic properties.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for Materials Project style data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create and manage databases of materials data (MongoDB) following the Materials Project schema, facilitating data storage and querying for high-throughput studies.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/Output validator for DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validator to ensure VASP calculation inputs and outputs are compatible with Materials Project standards and data integrity requirements.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion analysis tools for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An add-on to pymatgen providing algorithms and tools for analyzing diffusion pathways and mechanisms in materials (e.g., NEB analysis, molecular dynamics trajectories).

tools.name: aiida-autocas
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automatic active space selection in multireference calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that automates the selection of active spaces for multireference quantum chemical calculations, facilitating complex electronic structure workflows.

tools.name: aiida-dynamic-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic workflow definition plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that allows users to define workflows dynamically using Python functions, enhancing flexibility in computational materials science pipelines.

tools.name: aiida-pyscf
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for PySCF quantum chemistry framework
tools.detailed_description: Integrates the PySCF (Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework) into the AiiDA ecosystem, enabling provenance tracking and workflow automation for quantum chemistry simulations.

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based crystal structure viewer
tools.detailed_description: A crystal structure viewer built upon fresnel and pymatgen libraries, designed for high-quality visualization of materials structures within Python environments.

tools.name: aiida-gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: Provides an interface to run Gaussian quantum chemistry calculations within the AiiDA workflow engine, supporting various calculation types and data parsing.

tools.name: aiidalab-empa-surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for on-surface chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An application for the AiiDAlab platform focused on simulating and analyzing on-surface chemistry and self-assembly of molecules on surfaces.

tools.name: optimas
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable optimization framework powered by libEnsemble
tools.detailed_description: A framework for performing large-scale optimization of scientific simulations (e.g., plasma physics), leveraging libEnsemble for parallel resource management.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen IO module for OpenMM simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that facilitates the setup and execution of OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations using pymatgen data structures.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for electronic band structure plotting
tools.detailed_description: An interactive Jupyter widget designed for visualizing electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) in computational materials science.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: IDE for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: An integrated development environment and workflow manager for computational materials science, supporting atomistic simulations, thermodynamics, and data management.

tools.name: python-workflow-definition
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperability layer for Python scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: Defines a standard for Python-based scientific workflows to enable interoperability between major platforms like AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron.

tools.name: atomate2_ffforge
tools.one_line_profile: Active-learning workflow for MLIP generation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow package built on atomate2 and jobflow for autonomously generating machine-learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) via active learning.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Slater Koster tight-binding solver
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package for solving Slater-Koster tight-binding topological Hamiltonians, useful for electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiida-siesta
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for SIESTA DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting the SIESTA density functional theory code with the AiiDA workflow framework, enabling automated electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin designed to interface with and manage workflows involving machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) for materials simulations.

tools.name: ml_atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-assisted Atomate workflow for materials screening
tools.detailed_description: A code extension for Atomate that integrates machine learning techniques to assist in autonomous computational materials screening workflows.

tools.name: pyvasp-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Programmatic workflow for VASP job submission and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A flexible Python-based workflow tool designed to describe, submit, and analyze VASP (Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package) jobs programmatically.

tools.name: AFL-agent
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent for NIST Autonomous Formulation Laboratory
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent designed for the Autonomous Formulation Laboratory at NIST, facilitating automated materials formulation and experimentation.

tools.name: hermes
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible materials modeling and lab automation tool
tools.detailed_description: A software package from NIST for flexible materials modeling and laboratory automation, supporting data management and experimental workflows.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for atomistic materials design, including tools for DFT calculations, machine learning force fields, and database management, developed by NIST.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: MAterials Simulation Toolkit for use with pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to manage and automate computational materials science workflows, specifically built to work alongside pymatgen for defect and diffusion calculations.

tools.name: InvDesFlow-AL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning-based generative framework for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: A framework that utilizes active learning and generative models to iteratively optimize and discover novel functional materials with targeted properties.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Yambo calculations
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with the Yambo code to automate Many-Body Perturbation Theory (MBPT) calculations and manage their provenance.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for drawing ternary phase diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed to generate and customize ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) for materials science, offering an alternative to pymatgen's plotting capabilities.

tools.name: pynta
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for reaction path exploration on metallic surfaces
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool designed for exploring reaction paths and transition states on metallic surfaces, facilitating catalysis research.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA interface for CASTEP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that provides an interface to the CASTEP DFT code, enabling automated high-throughput calculations and provenance tracking.
